Name: Natures_Grasp
Description: Snare your target. Preventing them from moving.

Name: Focus_Shot
Description: Fire a shot dealing up to 40 damage and gain 25 energy.

Name: Steady_Shot
Description: Fire a short based steady shot. Dealing up to 200 damage.

Name: Sniper_Shot
Description: Fire a long based steady shot. Dealing up to 300 damage.

Name: Deep_Marrow
Description: Fire a shot that deals 75 damage and stuns your enemy.

Name: Double_Tap
Description: Quickly shoot 2 arrows at your enemy dealing up to 250 damage.

Name: Jaggged_Bolt
Description: Disorient your target and dealingng 2% of your enemies health in damage.

Name: Venom_Touch
Description: Deals 15 damage to your target every second.

Name: Vengeful_Shot
Description: Deals up to 250 damage to your enemy heals you for 3/4 of the damage done.

Name: Dredging_Bolt
Description: Fire a dredged bolt at your target, magic locking them.

Name: Burning_Blood
Description: Ignite your next 4 shots with fire. Dealing up to 5 damage each stack every second for 10 seconds.

Name: Tiger_Speed
Description: Gain 40 energy annd Increase movement speed by 300% for the next 10 seconds.

Name: Quiver
Description: Fire 3 shots hitting the closest 3 enemies.

Name: Envenom
Description: Fire a shot with venom that slows your targets movement speed by 50%.

Name: Quickfire
Description: Fire a single shot dealing up to 100 damage.

Name: Ricochet
Description: Fire a shot at your target dealing 250 damage and richoshet the arrow to a nearby enemy dealing 1/2 the damage.

Name: Unload
Description: Fires a bolt every secondd for the next 5 seconds dealing up to 500 damage.

Name: Killshot
Description: Fire a shot that deals 10% of the players health when they are blow 25% health.

Name: Overdue_Gas
Description: Fire an arrow drenched in explosive gas. Disorienting your target and dealing 150 damage and 200 damage on gas explosion.

Name: Sharpening
Description: Disarm your enemy and use their weapon as a sharpening stone. Increasinig damage by 10% for the next 5 attacks.

Name: Berserk
Description: Become Enraged and increase your maximum amount of energy by 100% for the next 30 seconds.

Name: Dash
Description: Sheathe yourself, putting up your weapons and increase your movement speed by 50% for 10 seceonds.

Name: Purgatory
Description: Cheat death by becoming invulnerable for 10s.

Name: Blindless_Swing
Description: Continously swing your swords dealing up to 100 damage each swing.

Name: Ankle_Cutter
Description: Cut at your targets ankles, snaring them.

Name: Twisting_Blade
Description: Jab your enemy, stunning them.

Name: Rupture
Description: Slice your target vigoursly, internally rupturing them causing 15 damage every second for 10 seconds.

Name: Blood_Rush
Description: Slice your enemy dealing up to 50 damage and gaining 10 energy.

Name: Raging_Slash
Description: Grit your weapons and harshly slash your enemy dealing up to 150 damage each.

Name: Chomp
Description: Chump at your target, disarming them.

Name: Backswing
Description: Lunge your sword back and forcefully swing towards your target dealing up to 200 damage.

Name: Grounded
Description: Slam your sword down to the ground, stunning all nearby enemies.

Name: Raging_Blow
Description: Swing your sword at your target dealing up to 350 damage.

Name: Power_Hilt
Description: Swing your sword at your target dealing up to 150 damage.

Name: Damaging
Description: Hit your target disrupting interrupting them.

Name: Vengeful_Swing
Description: Swing your sword at your target dealing up to 75 damage and gaining 10 energy.

Name: Ignite
Description: Deal 25 damamge to your enemy every sec for 10 seconds.

Name: Firebomb
Description: Ignite your enemy with a bomb that explodes and damages up to 3 nearby enemies.

Name: Heat_Exhaustion
Description: Use the power of the sun to make your target exhausted, disorientinig them.

Name: Burning_Shackles
Description: Snare your enemy with the power of burning shackles.

Name: Fire_Surge
Description: Shoot a surge of fire at your enemy dealaing up to 250 damamge.

Name: Firenado
Description: Launch a tornado of fire towards your enemy dealing 100 damage to everything in it's path.

Name: Meteor_Strike
Description: Raise upon the gods and fire 5 meteors every second dealing up to 250 damage.

Name: Blast_Wave
Description: Fire a wave of fire that deals 200 damage and stuns your enemy.

Name: Fire_Bolt
Description: Shoot a bolt of fire at your enemy dealing up to 175 damamge.

Name: Lava_Pool
Description: Create a pool of lava dealing up to 200 damage every second for 6 seconds.

Name: Heat_Exposure
Description: Heat up your targets weapon, disarming them.

Name: Radial_Aura
Description: Spawn an aura that follows your target dealing 30 damage to them every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

Name: Fire_Wave
Description: Shoot a wave of fire at your target dealing up to 125 damage.
